text.div:
CH_EMED

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/ImplementationGuide/ch.fhir.ig.ch-emed

Implementation Guide for the eMedication in Switzerland.

name: CH_EMED
title: CH EMED (R4)
description: Implementation Guide for the eMedication in Switzerland.

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.name: 2-6 PDF as original representation of the Medication Prescription document
2-7 PDF as original representation of the Medication Card document
2-7 Medication Card document (with references/fullUrls as UUIDs)
resource.description: Example for Bundle (with references/fullUrls as UUIDs)

resource.name: Pharmaceutical Advice document to change the dosage
1-1 Composition for Medication Treatment Plan document
2-3 Composition for Medication Treatment Plan document
2-5 Composition for Medication Treatment Plan document
Triatec with local codes
resource.description: Example for Medication with local medication codes

resource.name: Triatec with code not from VS
resource.description: Example for Medication with ingredient code, which is NOT included in the SCT-VS with extensible binding (to show the warning)

resource.name: 1-2 Medication Dispense with Medication Beloc Zok
2-3 Medication Statement with Medication Beloc Zok
2-7 Medication Statement with Medication Beloc Zok
Medication Statement with NOT recommended timing codes
resource.description: Example for MedicationStatment with NOT recommended timing codes

resource.name: Medication Statement with a medication in reserve and a maximum dosage
resource.description: Example for MedicationStatment - Take Nitrostat 1 tablet as needed for chest pain, maximum 3 tablets in 15 minutes

resource.name: EDQM - Standard Terms
resource.description: EDQM - Standard Terms used in Switzerland (aggregations of codes of ValueSets RouteOfAdministration, Dose Form, see original codes system defined in https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#)

resource.description: Definition of the composition for the medication card document

resource.description: Definition of the composition for the medication dispense document

resource.description: Definition of the composition for the medication list document

resource.description: Definition of the composition for the medication prescription document

resource.description: Definition of the composition for the medication treatment plan document

resource.description: Definition of the composition for the pharmaceutical advice document

resource.description: Definition of the bundle for the medication card document

resource.description: Definition of the bundle for the medication dispense document

resource.description: Definition of the bundle for the medication list document

resource.description: Definition of the bundle for the medication prescription document

resource.description: Definition of the bundle for the medication treatment plan document

resource.description: Definition of the bundle for the pharmaceutical advice document

resource.name: CH EMED Dosage (MedicationStatement / MedicationDispense)
resource.description: Definition of the dosage (used in MedicationStatement / MedicationDispense)

resource.name: CH EMED Dosage Split (MedicationStatement / MedicationDispense)
resource.description: Definition of the split dosage  (used in MedicationStatement / MedicationDispense)

resource.name: CH EMED Dosage (MedicationRequest)
resource.description: Definition of the dosage (used in MedicationRequest)

resource.name: CH EMED Dosage Split (MedicationRequest)
resource.description: Definition of the split dosage (used in MedicationRequest)

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Dispense
resource.description: Extension to reference an external MedicationDispense and the Medication Dispense document that contains it

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Pharmaceutical Advice
resource.description: Extension to reference an external Observation and the Pharmaceutical Advice document that contains it

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Prescription
resource.description: Extension to reference an external MedicationRequest and the Medication Prescritpion document that contains it

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Substitution
resource.description: This extension is used to indicate whether the medication can be substituted for this patient, i.e. whether it is allowed.                          (For a prescription, MedicationRequest.substitution is used to record whether a substitution is allowed or not.                          When dispensing, a performed substitution is recorded in MedicationDispense.substitution.)

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Treatment Plan
resource.description: Extension to reference an external MedicationStatement and the Medication Treatment Plan document that contains it

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Treatment Reason
resource.description: Extension to represent the treatment reason

resource.name: CH EMED Extension MedicationStatement Changed
resource.description: Extension to represent the changed MedicationStatement

resource.name: CH EMED Medication (MedicationDispense)
resource.description: Definition of the medication for the medication dispense

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationDispense (DIS)
resource.description: Definition of the medication dispense for the medication dispense document

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationDispense (LIST)
resource.description: Definition of the medication dispense for the medication list document

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationRequest (PRE)
resource.description: Definition of the medication request for the medication prescription document

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationRequest (LIST)
resource.description: Definition of the medication request for the medication list document

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationStatement
resource.description: Definition of the medication statement for the medication treatment plan document (and as basis medication statement)

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationStatement (CARD)
resource.description: Definition of the medication statement for the medication card document

resource.name: CH EMED MedicationStatement (LIST)
resource.description: Definition of the medication statement for the medication list document

resource.name: CH EMED Observation (PADV)
resource.description: Definition of the observation for the pharmaceutical advice document

resource.name: CH EMED Observation (LIST)
resource.description: Definition of the observation for the medication list document

resource.name: CH EMED Organization
resource.description: Definition of the organization for the eMedication context

resource.name: CH EMED Practitioner
resource.description: Definition of the practitioner for the eMedication context

resource.name: CH EMED PractitionerRole
resource.description: Definition of the practitioner role for the eMedication context

resource.name: EDQM - Pharmaceutical Dose Form
resource.description: Valueset Pharmaceutical Dose Form from EDQM, PDF, export20.5.2021, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#

resource.name: EDQM - RouteOfAdministration
resource.description: Valueset RouteOfAdministration from EDQM, ROA, export 1.6.2021, see https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#
